snippet: Prosecutors said four people caught in a teacher certification fraud scheme have agreed to stop teaching, ending the federal case involving teachers in Arkansas, Mississippi and Tennessee.
abstract: Prosecutors said four people caught in a teacher certification fraud scheme led by Clarence D Mumford Sr have agreed to stop teaching, ending federal case involving teachers in Arkansas, Mississippi and Tennessee.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors said four people caught in a teacher certification fraud scheme have agreed to stop teaching, ending the federal case involving teachers in Arkansas, Mississippi and Tennessee.

headline.main: Tennessee: Case Over Test Fraud Is Shut
headline.print_headline: Tennessee: Case Over Test Fraud Is Shut
